name: Block Chainer
description:
GMTK Game Jam 2021 submission - Theme "Joined Together".

Come be a block chainer for the world's most centralised decrypto currency!  Chain blocks together to pump your Coin Price, hit all time highs, stack those sats, and pull in all the fomo buyers out there! All under the watchful eye of Mr Doge! :)

Game tips:
- UP, DOWN keys to move the block to a different lane
- LEFT key to speed up the block
- ESC ends the current session
- Goal is chain/join as many blocks as possible by matching the colour/shape
- Matching chained blocks (turns green) will increase the Coin Price, non-matched blocks (turns red) will reduce the Coin Price.
- Game is over when the Coin Price drops to $0!
~ Watch out for Dumps, where the Coin Price drops faster than usual - you'll know it when this happens ;) Quickly chain matching blocks to recover.

Thank you for dropping by, and trying out the game! Hope you enjoyed it, and take care! :D
